name: Sister Garaele

personality.mannerisms: Earnest, wrings hands when worried, quotes Tymora's teachings

role: Priestess of Tymora, Harper agent. Reports on Phandalin events to Harper superiors.
quest: Ask banshee Agatha about Bowgentle's spellbook location. Gift: jeweled silver comb. Reward: 3 potions of healing.
background: Sought out Agatha herself but banshee wouldn't appear. Needs intermediary with flattery skills.
harpers: Scattered network of spies opposing tyranny, gathering info, thwarting abusers of power
recruitment: If party helps with Agatha quest, approaches members who value secrecy and positive change. Awards title of 'Watcher'.
treasure: Silver comb for party (to give Agatha), 3 potions healing (reward)
